bug.author: szha
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>Description</denchmark-h>
on the website, two scrolls appear which prevents keyboard scrolling. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2626883/89114087-aed47f00-d42d-11ea-89d3-fcd3cd06dd39.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
Use Chrome Version 84.0.4147.105 (Official Build) (64-bit) on OSX and visit <denchmark-link:https://mxnet.apache.org/api/python/docs/tutorials/packages/gluon/image/mnist.html>https://mxnet.apache.org/api/python/docs/tutorials/packages/gluon/image/mnist.html</denchmark-link>
